actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the return of the remains of Pocahontas to the United States and the establishment of an appropriate memorial commemorating her place in American history.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to bring the remains of Pocahontas back to the Jamestown area of Virginia. Directs the Secretary upon consultation with American Indian Organizations to establish a memorial commemorating her place in American History. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as necessary to carry out the provisions of this joint resolution.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the return of the remains of Pocahontas to the United States and the establishment of an appropriate memorial commemorating her place in American history.
